MESSAGE.value: Process asynchronous submission results in the order in which they complete.
Javadoc, comments, typos, removed unneeded casts and unboxings.
FAQ updates following the migration to git.
Fixed unit test by adding property.
Updates to IntelliJ project files, including run configurations.
Fixed "[ #307757 ] HTML labels must point to HTML form controls". In the case of full selection controls without fieldset/legend, no @for is produced.
Added property to enable instance exposing type annotations.
Mention that Java 1.5 or 1.6 is needed.
Asynchronous submissions now able to deserialize in the background.
